title: NOM Bistro: Family-Friendly Dining with Play Area
blurb: Modern cuisine with a mini dragon play area for kids.
description: NOM Bistro, located at Macpherson Community Club, offers modern cuisine with a twist. Appetizers include luncheon meat strips and chicken skin crisps. The salted egg pasta features prawns. The Double Trouble Burger has succulent patties. There is a kids menu available. A key feature is the indoor play area with a slide resembling the Toa Payoh Dragon Playground, providing a safe environment for children while parents dine. Expect to spend between $15 to $25 per head. The bistro exudes a sense of calmness away from the city environment.
datetime_display: Friendly Dining Spot in MacPherson With A Mini Dragon Play Area
full_address: NOM Where: 400 Paya Lebar Way, Macpherson Community Club Level 1, Singapore 379131 Website 20 September School Holidays 2025 Ideas: Fun Things To Do With

title: NOM Bistro & Family-Friendly Dining Spot
blurb: Appetisers of luncheon meat strips and chicken skin.
description: NOM Bistro offers a family-friendly dining experience with a mini dragon-themed play area. The menu includes appetizers such as luncheon meat strips, fries, and chicken skin crisps, accompanied by homemade sauce. It's an awesome way to turn relatively unwanted leftovers into something yummy. The bistro provides a comfortable and engaging environment for families to enjoy a meal while kids have fun in the play area. The dragon-themed play area adds a unique touch, making it a memorable dining destination for families with young children. The bistro aims to create a welcoming atmosphere where both parents and children can relax and have a great time.
datetime_display: fries and chicken skin crisps whets one’s appetites

blurb: Educational programmes designed to stimulate young minds.
description: Intuitive Minds offers a range of educational programmes designed to stimulate young minds and foster a love for learning. These programmes cater to children of various age groups and focus on developing critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity. The activities are designed to be engaging and interactive, ensuring that children have fun while learning. It is a great place for families to enhance their children's education.

title: Highlights Of REINVENTION Festival At GENEO
blurb: Highlights Of REINVENTION Festival At GENEO, Singapore
description: Explore the REINVENTION Festival at GENEO, Singapore Science Park, a vibrant event showcasing innovation and creativity. This family-friendly festival offers a range of activities suitable for all ages, including interactive exhibits, workshops, and performances. Discover cutting-edge technologies, engage in hands-on experiments, and enjoy captivating shows. The festival aims to inspire and educate, providing a fun and engaging experience for the whole family. With a focus on science, technology, engineering, and arts, the REINVENTION Festival is a must-visit destination for those seeking a blend of entertainment and learning. Perfect for families looking to spend a day out.

blurb: Explore the SG60 Heart&Soul Experience at Orchard Library.
description: Discover the SG60 Heart&Soul Experience at Orchard Library, a unique showcase celebrating Singapore's heritage and culture. Immerse yourself in interactive exhibits, historical displays, and engaging activities that highlight the nation's journey through the years. Perfect for families and individuals of all ages, this experience offers a fun and educational way to learn about Singapore's rich history and vibrant culture.
